Key Match Events: Alperen Sengun had 23 points, Jalen Green added 22 points.
Dillon Brooks had 19 points and Cam Whitmore added 18 points.
Houston used a 21-8 run to take a 61-52 lead into halftime.
Houston opened the second half with an 11-4 spurt.
Kyrie Irving, Klay Thompson, and Dereck Lively II returned after sitting out Monday.
Quentin Grimes led the Mavericks with 17 points off the bench.
Thompson and Irving added 16 points each.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Houston’s 32-12 run to end the first half and start the second half.
Houston’s victory was helped by making 18 of 23 free throws compared to just 8 of 16 by Dallas.
